    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:AA309_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>AA309_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Exploring a Romano-African city: Thugga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen einer Romano-Afrikanischen Stadt: 
Thugga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorer une ville Romano-Africaine : 
Thugga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorando uma cidade Romano-Africana: 
Thugga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorazione della città Romano-Africana: 
Thugga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερεύνηση μιας ρομανο-αφρικανικής πόλης: Thugga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explorar una ciudad Romano-Africana: Thugga</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">From Rome to Pompeii and Ephesus the excavation of Roman remains is well known, but what of Roman remains in Africa? This unit looks at the Roman city of Thugga and examines the influence that Roman architecture and art had on Africa and its people.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Arts and History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Ephesus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Pompeii</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Thugga</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von Rom zu Pompeji und zu Ephesus ist die 
Aushöhlung des römischen Remains weithin bekannt, aber was des 
römischen Remains in Afrika? Diese Maßeinheit betrachtet die 
römische Stadt von Thugga und überprüft den Einfluß, den römische
Architektur und kunst auf Afrika und seinen Leuten hatten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De Rome à Pompeii et à Ephesus l'excavation des 
restes romains est bien connue, mais lesquels des restes romains en 
Afrique ? Cette unité regarde la ville romaine de Thugga et 
examine l'influence que l'architecture romaine et l'art ont eue sur 
l'Afrique et ses personnes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De Roma a Pompeii e a Ephesus a escavação do 
remains roman é sabida bem, mas que do remains roman em África? 
Esta unidade olha a cidade roman de Thugga e examina a 
influência que a arquitetura roman e a arte tiveram em África e em 
seus povos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Da Roma a Pompeii ed a Ephesus lo scavo del 
remains romano è ben noto, ma che cosa del remains romano in Africa? 
Questa unità guarda la città romana di Thugga ed esamina 
l'influenza che l'architettura romana e l'arte hanno avute sull'Africa
e sulla relativa gente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από τη Ρώμη στην Πομπηία και Ephesus η ανασκαφή των
ρωμαϊκών υπολειμμάτων είναι ευρέως γνωστή, αλλά τι των 
ρωμαϊκών υπολειμμάτων στην Αφρική; Αυτή η μονάδα εξετάζει
τη ρωμαϊκή πόλη Thugga και εξετάζει την επιρροή που η 
ρωμαϊκές αρχιτεκτονική και η τέχνη είχαν στην Αφρική και τους 
ανθρώπους της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿De Roma a Pompeii y a Ephesus la excavación del 
restos romano es bien sabido, pero qué del restos romano en África? 
Esta unidad mira la ciudad romana de Thugga y examina la 
influencia que la configuración romana y el arte tenían en África y
su gente.</string>
          </description>
